name: Jellyx
description:
An amazing puzzle adventure is waiting for you!
Jellyx is a colourful unique time killer inspired by all-known and loved arcade puzzle games.
Fit double block like in Doctor Mario and Tetris and play new unique, an adventure filled fun game! Delve into the world of magic and miracles together with your fancy characters and help them solve puzzles!
Jellyx is a fun new brainteaser puzzle game for all.
